rs-group.rs-layer: Now enrolling Kindergarten - 8th grade students for 2020 - 2021!

img.title: LJP_4810(3)
img.rs-layer: All students take Spanish, Arabic, Physical Education, Music and Art!

img.title: LJP_5050-700×350
img.rs-layer: Academics, Social-emotional Learning and Talent Development for All!

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-lg vc_btn3-shape-square vc_btn3-style-outline-custom vc_btn3-block vc_btn3-icon-left
vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-lg vc_btn3-shape-square vc_btn3-style-outline-custom vc_btn3-block vc_btn3-icon-left
vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-lg vc_btn3-shape-square vc_btn3-style-outline-custom vc_btn3-block vc_btn3-icon-left

div.p: Northeast College Prep is a tuition-free public charter school. All Kindergarten – 8th grade students take Spanish, Arabic, Art, Music and Physical Education.
Currently, there are openings in 2nd – 8th grade for the 2019-2020 school year. Call the School Director, Erika Sass, at 612-248-8243 for the most up to date information.
A few recent Northeast College Prep accomplishments:

ul.li: Earned a national award called the “Seal of Excellence” from Welcoming Schools for creating a safe and welcoming school for all students and families (Human Rights Campaign, 2019)
Featured in “Schools That Work: Stories of Relevant Learning” (MN Comeback, 2019)
Recognized by the Minnesota Department of Education as a high-quality charter school (2018)
Authorized as an International Baccalaureate (I.B.) World School offering the Primary Years Programme (2018)
District 60 Recognition for creating a high quality school in NE Minneapolis from MN Senator Dziedzic (2018)

div.p: All students experience rigorous and differentiated academics, social-emotional and talent development, and the opportunity to work and play in a diverse environment. Are you interested in learning more? Come and visit us!
Current family members can click here to get more information on School Supply List, Uniform Information, Events Calendar and more!

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-md vc_btn3-shape-square vc_btn3-style-outline vc_btn3-color-primary

div.p: Primary Languages Spoken By Our Students
Year Recognized By The MN Department of Education As A High-Quality Charter School

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid thim-bg-overlay vc_custom_1514693101851 vc_row-has-fill vc_general vc_parallax vc_parallax-content-moving
vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid thim-bg-pattern thim-bg-overlay-green vc_custom_1514695336059

div.div: "My daughter has been at NECP since Kindergarten. The school is helping her grow to be kind, smart, mindful and worldly. The school is nurturing her love of learning. I lost two languages in my own immigration experience and NECP is helping her to gain two, which are skills that will help her throughout her entire life."

div.h3: Mohamed, Parent of 1st and 5th grade Students

div.div: There are many things our family likes about the school. The class sizes are small, there is good quality academics, and there is diversity of students. Also, the school times and uniforms are convenient for us since we are working parents. The teachers and staff are always friendly and welcoming.

"All the teachers are kind. The school is open to everyone and that helps me learn about other students' countries. We do a lot of fun projects. We learn Arabic and Spanish, and have art. It's also really easy to make friends here."
"The school has good teachers. They teach us a lot of good subjects. I also like Arabic. They say it's good to learn a different language, so I like learning Arabic."

div.h3: Transito Maria, Parent of Two 3rd grade Students

div.div:
Ustedes nos hacen sentir confianza, los niños están felices cada vez que van ala escuela. Los niños van progresando poco a poco, no como yo quisiera, pero a veces creo que saben mas de lo que yo veo. En general creo que están bien.
You make us feel confident, the kids are happy every time they go to school. The kids are progressing little by little, not as I would like it, but sometimes I feel I exaggerate and they know more than I can see. In general I can see they are doing fine.
"I like learning Arabic, Spanish, and art"

div.h3: Naciimo, Parent of 5th grade, 3rd grade and 2nd Grade Students

div.div: NECP is a excellent school. Since my girls started at this school, I can see their academic and social growth.
"I like to read a lot, and the school always has good books for me. I also like learning different languages."

div.h3: Biftu, Parent of 3rd grade and 2nd Grade Students

div.div: There are so many good things to say about the school, my kids don't even like missing school. The teachers are really nice and they work together with the parents to help their child do well. The employees help me every time and go out of their way to make me feel welcome. The school works with you as a parent.
"I really like the library here. I also like Arabic, Spanish, gym and Rock and Read."

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid thim-bg-overlay text-center thim-becom-teacher-kindergarten vc_custom_1514695361371 vc_row-has-fill vc_general vc_parallax vc_parallax-content-moving

p.span: Do you believe that all students can achieve academically and socially regardless of any other factor? Do you want to work with a team of people 100% committed to doing whatever it takes to ensure all students succeed? Do you want multiple observations each week and on-going professional development so you can improve your practice? If so, apply to work at Northeast College Prep.

a.class: vc_general vc_btn3 vc_btn3-size-lg vc_btn3-shape-rounded vc_btn3-style-modern vc_btn3-color-warning

div.p: For NECP families: For application information on MN health care program, including how to apply and assistance with applications, please click here: MN health care and health insurance programs

esass@northeastcollegeprep.org
